hunger.title: Glutton
hunger.description: as a §aGourmand§f, your §estomach §fdemands to §4§lconstantly be fed

entity_data.CommandOnEntityHit: execute at @s as @e[distance=0..3,type=!minecraft:armor_stand] unless entity @s[palladium.power=alienevo_aliens:lepidopterran] at @s run effect give @s alienevo:goo 15 0 true

digestion.title: digest
first_tick_commands: execute as @s if entity @e[type=!minecraft:ender_dragon,type=!minecraft:warden,type=!minecraft:wither,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run energybar value add @s omni_extras:murkgourmand stomach 150
execute as @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:ender_dragon,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run energybar value add @s omni_extras:murkgourmand stomach 1000
execute as @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:warden,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run energybar value add @s omni_extras:murkgourmand stomach 850
execute as @s if entity @e[type=minecraft:wither,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run energybar value add @s omni_extras:murkgourmand stomach 900
execute as @s if entity @e[type=#omni_extras:float,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run effect give @s minecraft:levitation 10 1 true
execute as @s if entity @e[type=#omni_extras:float,sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run playsound omni_extras:gangsta master @s ~ ~ ~ 2
execute as @s if entity @e[sort=nearest,distance=0..3,tag=AlienEvo.CarriedEntity] run scoreboard players set @s Gourmand.Swallow 1
commands: execute as @s if score @s Gourmand.Swallow matches 1 run energybar value add @s omni_extras:murkgourmand stomach 4

leap_unlock.title: Leap
leap_unlock.description: Launch yourself through the air and cover large distances quickly.

whip_unlock.title: Long Prehensile Tongues
whip_unlock.description: §9(Crouch) §fSpin and §a§lextend§r§f your tongue outwards to hit §4§lanyone§r§f nearby

mega_blast_unlock.title: Energy Regurgitation (Volley)
mega_blast_unlock.description: §9(Crouch + RightClick)§f Use a small chunk of your §a§lenergy§r§f to shoot out §4§lblasts§r§f in a volley

obliteration_unlock.title: Sub-Energy Destruction
obliteration_unlock.description: Upon eating an item that contains §d§lhigh§r§f amounts of §a§lenergy§r§f, §d§lunleash§r§f a §d§lhighly§r§f §4§ldestructive§r§f blast

blast_unlock.title: Energy Regurgitation
blast_unlock.description: §9(RightClick)§f Use a §cportion§f of your §a§lenergy§r§f to shoot out an §a§lenergy §r§fblast

chomp_unlock.title: Chomp
chomp_unlock.description: Chomp on §eorganic materials§f and §eprojectiles§f to obtain §a§lenergy

swallow_unlock.title: Tongue Ingestion
swallow_unlock.description: §9(Hold) §fPull mobs inside you via your §a§lextendable§r§f tongue and be able to §espit them out§f any time

eating_limit_unlock.title: Enhanced Ingestion
eating_limit_unlock.description: Enhances §eswallowing capacity§f, allowing ingestion of §4§llarger§r §fand §4§lbeefier§f§r targets.
